mapper.select: SELECT gmt_start FROM af_activity WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 2 AND `name` = #{tag};

SELECT id as meeting_id, gmt_start as start_time, case when (gmt_start>CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) then '0' when (gmt_end<CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) then '2' else '1' end as status FROM af_activity WHERE is_delete = 0 AND `status` = 2 AND `name` = #{tag} and DATE(`gmt_start`) >DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL -1 DAY) and DATE(`gmt_start`) < DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE,INTERVAL 2 DAY) ORDER BY gmt_start LIMIT 0,5 ;
